slides.title: Notice 5 things that you can see.
slides.subTitle: How does it look? Do you notice any patterns on it? What's the most prominent color?

slides.title: Notice 4 things that you can touch.
slides.subTitle: How does it feel? What's the texture like? What is it made of?

slides.title: Notice 3 things that you can hear.
slides.subTitle: How loud is it? What is it saying? Where is it coming from?

slides.title: Notice 2 things that you can smell.
slides.subTitle: What are the notes of the scent? Is it strong, or is it subtle?

slides.title: Notice 1 thing that you can taste
slides.subTitle: What's the flavor profile?
